channel.title: How to fix weilding slots
channel.description: Ok so I have Armadyl in my server and some other customs and well I spawned some Armadyl and put it in my shops and people bought it and said it was weilded in the sword/weapon slot and I need to know how to fix it. Thanks! -Nate

item.title: How to fix weilding slots
item.dc:creator: @pkakidjr1 pkakidjr1
item.description:
@pkakidjr1 wrote:

[quote=“adamhelloman8, post:5, topic:278326”][quote author=Mr Mopar link=topic=367326.msg2783032#msg2783032 date=1242266177]

weilded in the sword/weapon slot

isnt that where it should be?

Oh go to items.java and find the 2hand sword’s slot,you will see alot of numbers(the item ids)
then add it somewhere where the 2h’s are located

[/quote]

You’re fucked.

He said he wants to know where to put the armour.

Common sense would tell you not to put it in the 2h list, but lets see.

In item.java, you must add the id’s under the right part.

for example.

for the plate, you must add the item id underneath both body, and plate.

NOT 2h. -.-
No I mean the armour…the plate, legs, helm lol.[/quote]
Yea I got the platelegs to work but then the plate still weilds in the weapon slot.

Read full topic
